attributes.action: require local authorities to have minimum standards for the surfaces of roads and pavements to protect the safety of users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have a friend who is now 92 who has fallen 9 times in Guildford, Surrey as a result of poor pavement maintenance.
I also know that local politicians of all persuasions have campaigned for an improvement in very poor road surfaces in Surrey to no avail.  We should not have to campaign on such things when they are obviously health and safety matters.
